modelleertaal:
N = 3000
# Opgave optrekken met constante kracht Fwl = -k * v^2 Fres = ... a = Fres / m
dv = a * dt v = v + dv dx = v * dt x = x + dx t = t + dt
Pm = Fm * ... Pw = (Fwrol + Fwl) * ... Pres = Pm + Pw
k = ... Fm = 600 'N Fwrol = - ... 'N m = 1200 'kg v = ... 'm/s x = 0 'm t = 0 's dt = 0,1 's
